[[Image:Adam Tolkien.jpg: '''Adam Reuel Tolkien''' (born [[13 March]] [[1969]]) is the son of [[Christopher Tolkien]], brother to [[Rachel Tolkien]] and half brother to [[Simon Tolkien]]. He is a lighting engineer by profession, but has also translated into French several works of his grandfather: ''[[Pictures by J.R.R. Tolkien]]'' (1994), ''[[The Book of Lost Tales Part One]]'' (1995), and ''[[The Book of Lost Tales Part Two]]'' (1998). In the preface to ''[[The Children of Húrin]]'' he is also credited as having helped his father edit his grandfather's notes.
